Name: GP x Apex Limited Edition Men's Canvas
Description: This is one of the first co-created shoes in Bangladesh by two brands. This series was co-created by Apex and Grameenphone in alignment with the progress of Bangladesh. As part of this progress, we have joined hands with Grameenphone to pioneer one of the first series of shoes in Bangladesh, which was not only made in Bangladesh but designed and developed right here, to inspire men, women, and children who, like us, are proud to have been born in Bangladesh.
